# VEHICLE::FORCE_SUBMARINE_SURFACE_MODE

## Summary
Forces a submarine to sit higher out of the water like it does automatically when there is no driver

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** forceSurface
